title: The wife of Palestinian terrorism to address the Clinton Foundation
subtitle: Critics claim that the Clinton Foundation is a "merciful" wife of the "bombmaker" by inviting Palestinian nanny Hanan Al-Escape, a prize winner to speak on a dinner occasion.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hanan was invited to speak at a dinner under the Clinton Global Initiative to provide chemical materials used to make bombs that killed Israelis.
